nodes.text: The Peacekeeping of Parliock was a conflict that was fought at some point before the Clone Wars, which involved the Jedi Order.

During the Clone Wars, the droid professor Huyang recalled the Peacekeeping of Parliock while telling a class of Jedi Initiates about conflicts the Jedi had been involved in. The architect droid mentioned the event while instructing the younglings in the construction of their own lightsabers.
